Reviews.Title: clear picture
Reviews.Author: WOODTRNER
Reviews.Content: I bought  this to replace a broken camera as part of a store surveillance system. The picture quality is very sharp.  Watch out shoplifters!

Reviews.Title: great indoor camera
Reviews.Author: bermudatour76
Reviews.Content: Like the other reviewer said this camera blows away all my other 600tvl/540tvl videosecu and other clone products(still using them/get my money's worth out of them)...These are the cheapest entry level pro-gear camera's you can buy(IMO)....I use them in my bars/restaurants and they work great.Out of the eight videosecu 600tvl/dome cameras i bought(18months ago) three have completely failed and one the video cable connector needs constant realignment/ basically useless.....just a warning...

Reviews.Title: This camera has poor quality video
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I looked at ratings for this camera and thought it would be a good one.  After receiving it I hooked it up to my existing dvr and am not impressed at all.  My cheaper cameras have better quality.  I would not be able to recognize someone further then 3' away from the camera.

Reviews.Title: Not good at all
Reviews.Author: H.M
Reviews.Content: Worked only half a day, was fried next day, I have returned this item.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00DHOZ4X4/ref=ox_sc_sfl_title_5?ie=UTF8&psc;=1∣=A11ILNRKGKVYIR buy this I have bought it as replacement, same video qulity but much better built qulity.

Reviews.Title: Color is great!
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Of every camera I have connected to my system, this has the most true-to-life color. Don't expect to read license plates or anything (Hey, it's an INDOOR camera!) but when used correctly with clean power and quality video cable, you get a great bang for your buck! I'll probably pick up a couple more of these in the near future!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jenny
Reviews.Content: I just recieved this camera today and it has a Great Picture , I wish I could give it  10 Stars and I'm so Impressed I'm going to order another. I can't believe the last reviewer he must of got a bad one or his wiring or DVR is the problem.I have a more expensive camera (700 TVL)from a different company (Gadspot) and this Camera blows it away. Very Happy.

Reviews.Title: Received on time and Easy to setup
Reviews.Author: I Spend Too Much
Reviews.Content: Received on time and Easy to setupCustomer paid twice the purchase for this Item.I will be purchasing more of this Item.

ProductInfo.Features:
Ultra High Resolution: 600 TV Lines (650 B/W night-time), DVD quality image
3.8mm Fixed Lens, 0.1 Lux
12V DC
Auto White Balance, AGC, SBLC, Flickerless
3 Axis construction for EASY installation, Service Video Out
ProductInfo.Name: DFL20S CNB Super HIGH resolution of 600 TV Lines (DVD quality) Color Dome Video Surveillance Security Camera, Black Case
